rooms.description: You are in the lobby of a luxurious hotel. To the north, you can see a doorway leading to a bar.

items.name: chest
items.description: An ornate chest locked tightly. Looks like it needs a specific key.

useEffects.golden key: The chest unlocks revealing a mysterious note.

characters.name: Adriana
characters.dialogue: Isn't this hotel enchanting? I've heard there's a chest here that holds a secret. But you'll need a key to unveil it.

rooms.description: You've stepped into the hotel's bar. The aroma of vintage wines fills the air, and there's a soft jazz playing in the background.

items.name: golden key
items.description: A shiny golden key with intricate engravings, it seems special.

characters.name: Rafael
characters.dialogue: Ah, the key! It has been in my family for generations. But, for you, I think I can part with it.
